history.proof: intros d sigma H. unfold predta_compat_check. induction d. - reflexivity. - srun best use: st_compat_check_correct, M1_semantics_1 unfold: predta_correct_wrt_sign. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: andb_true_iff, predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2.

original: intros d sigma H. unfold predta_compat_check. induction d. - reflexivity. - simpl. apply andb_true_iff. split. + apply IHd1. apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H. destruct H as [H1 _]. apply H1. + apply IHd2. apply predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 in H. destruct H as [_ H2]. apply H2.
